title: Henry Bolte speech at opening of relocated Dandenong Stock Market (1958)
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Description and travel
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
abstract: Dandenong - Opening ceremony of relocated Dandenong Stock Market
description: Silent film footage of the then Premier of Victoria, Henry Bolte, presenting his speech at the opening of the Dandenong Stock Market at its new location in Cheltenham Road (1958). Includes scenes of dignitaries and spectators, and a tour of the stockyards. Athol Adams footage is courtesy of Jenny and Owen Peake THIS FILM IS SILENT
